name: Underwater Riches 3D
description:
Some complexity is introduced in the 3d world....

Underwater Riches 3D offers an entire new degree of freedom, or two, and presents an underwater 3D world.
Sharks will now approach you if you enter their aggro radius, but will get distracted by bait that you can throw at them. 

Octopus however, will chase you to the ends of the earth.

Collect goodies and bring them to the ship!

Note: none of the assets are created by me. the animations however, are. That is why they are terrible.

shark: https://free3d.com/3d-model/rigged-shark-26511.html

octopus: https://rockbravo.com/product/octopus-rigged-animated-free-3d-model/

Submarine created by leclerical_error
Cover Image courtesy of  leclerical_error. ( rendered in better conditions.)
